name: Brain Runner (Kralatos, PiwoZz, ValouToutSeul)
description:
Brain Runner

A short game made in 48h during the Global Game Jam 2022, the theme was "Duality".

This game is a runner 2d where all level have 2 faces and you must use them to reach the goal.

There are 5 level and each one was made with a slightly different gameplay but still respecting the previous statement. 

Credits Kralatos

https://kralatos.itch.io/

Sulfeur84
